description: Evaluates whether a pull request has met all the conditions specified in its associated approval rules.

parameters.name: pullRequestId
parameters.description: The system-generated ID of the pull request you want to evaluate.

parameters.name: revisionId
parameters.description: The system-generated ID for the pull request revision. To retrieve the most recent revision ID for a pull request, use  GetPullRequest.

nested_items.name: evaluation
nested_items.description: The result of the evaluation, including the names of the rules whose conditions have been met (if any), the names of the rules whose conditions have not been met (if any), whether the pull request is in the approved state, and whether the pull request approval rule has been set aside by an override.

nested_items.name: approved
nested_items.description: Whether the state of the pull request is approved.

nested_items.name: overridden
nested_items.description: Whether the approval rule requirements for the pull request have been overridden and no longer need to be met.

nested_items.name: approvalRulesSatisfied
nested_items.description: The names of the approval rules that have had their conditions met.

nested_items.name: approvalRulesNotSatisfied
nested_items.description: The names of the approval rules that have not had their conditions met.
